events.message: I received the wrong size for my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system assigned the case to the Refund cluster based on keywords related to refund and order issues.
An agent specialized in refunds was assigned to handle the customer's refund request for order #45789.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Can you please provide your order number?
Could you please confirm the size you ordered and the size you actually received to proceed with your refund?
I ordered a size medium, but I received a size small instead, which doesn't fit me at all.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid label for the return shipping.
That sounds great, I appreciate your quick response and assistance with this issue.
Your refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited back to your account within 5â€“7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and to check if you need any further assistance from us.
We are closing this case as resolved. Please contact us again if you have any other issues or questions.
